query:
-- Create declaration items table for cost distribution
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `declarationItems` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `declarationId` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemCode` VARCHAR(50),
  `itemDescription` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `hsCode` VARCHAR(20),
  `quantity` INT NOT NULL,
  `unit` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `unitPrice` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemValue` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemWeight` INT,
  `valuePercentage` INT NOT NULL,
  `customsDutyRate` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `customsDutyAmount` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `salesTaxAmount` INT NOT NULL,
  `additionalFeesDistributed` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `declarationFeesDistributed` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `totalItemCost` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `declarationItems` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `declarationId` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemCode` VARCHAR(50),
  `itemDescription` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `hsCode` VARCHAR(20),
  `quantity` INT NOT NULL,
  `unit` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `unitPrice` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemValue` INT NOT NULL,
  `itemWeight` INT,
  `valuePercentage` INT NOT NULL,
  `customsDutyRate` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `customsDutyAmount` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `salesTaxAmount` INT NOT NULL,
  `additionalFeesDistributed` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `declarationFeesDistributed` INT DEFAULT 0,
  `totalItemCost` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
